Body:
pop3_server = utils.get_setting('pop3_server')
email = utils.get_setting('email')
password = utils.get_setting('password')
pop3 = poplib.POP3_SSL(pop3_server, poplib.POP3_SSL_PORT, timeout=30)
pop3.user(email)
pop3.pass_(password)
count, _ = pop3.stat()
for i in range(1, count + 1):
    pop3.dele(i)
pop3.quit()
